duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Stationstore operations, including hiring, supervising, and working with staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping, and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers, as well as execute the food program and set an example for the staff.

Lead a team of employees/management, recruit, interview, and hire, delegate and follow-up, teach and motivate others, plan, organize, communicate plans and ideas, handle cash and bookkeeping, solve problems, advocate, empathize, and ensure safety and security.

Physical requirements include standing and/or walking for up to 8 hours, lifting and/or carrying up to 30 pounds from ground to overhead, occasionally lifting and/or carrying up to 60 pounds from ground to waist level, pushing/pulling with arms up to a force of 20 pounds, bending at the waist with some twisting, grasping, reaching, and manipulating objects with hands.
